column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Went here last night- our waiter brandon was super nice
column2: fun and helpful. The food was delicious as well! We got the oysters
column6: and the broccoli. The broccoli was my least favorite but the other 4 items were all equally spectacular. The drinks are great too
column8: and you can tell the bartenders know what they're doing. If you're looking for a delicious meal
column11: you should check it out. We will definitely be back. Make reservations soon
